de.javasoft.synthetica.addons.systemmonitor
Class SystemMonitorModel

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.synthetica.addons.systemmonitor.SystemMonitorModel

public class SystemMonitorModel
extends java.lang.Object

The model holds all values for all added collectors. For every added collector a new thread will be started which calls the collector methods isochronus (at regular intervals). Removing a collector also stops the related thread.

Version:
1.01, 31.05.2009
See Also:
SystemMonitor, Collector

Method Detail

addModelChangedListener

public void addModelChangedListener(ModelChangedListener listener,
                                    int... eventTypes)
Adds a model change listener to the model. If no event type is specified the listener only receives non-value events (type != ModelChangedEvent.VALUE_TYPE, ModelChangedEvent.MAX_VALUE_TYPE).

Parameters:
listener - The listener.
eventTypes - Event types for which the listener should become informed

removeModelChangedListener

public void removeModelChangedListener(ModelChangedListener listener)
Removes the specified ModelChangedListener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to remove.

fireModelChangedEvent

protected void fireModelChangedEvent(ModelChangedEvent<?> evt)
Inform listeners.

Parameters:
evt - The ModelChangedEvent.

addCollector

public void addCollector(java.lang.String id,
                         int bufferSize,
                         int delay,
                         Collector collector)
Adds a collector. The collector methods will be called isochronus, specified by the delay param. For every added collector a new thread will be started. By removing a collector the related thread will be stopped.

Parameters:
id - Unique collector id.
bufferSize - Number of values to be buffered.
delay - Delay between collector calls in milliseconds.
collector - The collector used for gathering values.

removeCollector

public void removeCollector(java.lang.String id)
Removes a collector from the model and stops the related collector thread.

Parameters:
id - Collector id.

removeAll

public void removeAll()
Removes all collectors from the model and stops all collector threads.

getValues

public java.util.List<java.lang.Float> getValues(java.lang.String id)
Returns a list with all gathered percentage values.

Parameters:
id - Collector id.
Returns:
List with all available percentage values.

getBufferSize

public int getBufferSize(java.lang.String id)
Returns the buffer size for the specified collector.

Parameters:
id - Collector id.
Returns:
Buffer size (data independent).

getIds

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIds()
Returns a list with all added colletor ids.

Returns:
All currently added collector ids.
